name: Air Associates of Kansas
about: Air Associates of Kansas, located at the Johnson County Executive Airport in Olathe, Kansas, is a premier flight training center and a Cessna Pilot Center. We offer top-quality flight training with a welcoming atmosphere supported by top-notch instructors and cutting-edge aircraft. Our programs include private pilot licenses, multi-engine certification, and airline transport pilot ratings, along with additional ground school and seminars. Committed to safety and customer service, we provide a diverse range of aviation services, including aircraft management, charter, and maintenance. Whether you're an aspiring aviator or a seasoned pilot, Air Associates of Kansas is your launchpad for achieving your aviation goals. Contact us today to make your flying dreams a reality.
services:
["Private Pilot License
Commercial Pilot License
Airline Transport Pilot
Flight Instructor (CFI / FI)
Flight Instructor - Instrument (CFII / IRI)
Flight Instructor - Multi-Engine (MEI)
Instrument Rating (IR)
Multi-Engine Rating"]
